title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 362-3.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 362-3.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements

State Regulations
(a) In addition to the recordkeeping
requirements of subdivision
360.19
(k) of this

Title, transfer facility records must include records associated with the
radioactive waste detection procedures required by subdivision
362-3.5
(e) of this

Subpart, if applicable. (b) Transfer facilities registered or permitted pursuant to this Subpart must
submit an annual report in conformance with paragraph 360.19(k)(3) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
362-3.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
